1.title: Some Kind of Superhero
1.plot: Shinobi Girl daringly rescues a helpless secretary, Christina, from her deranged Wall Street boss and Shinobi Girl has no choice but to kill him. Meanwhile, Reporter Rachel Rafterson creates the "legend" of the avenging ninja girl and creates a media sensation and hope for the ninety-eight percent. While Noriko (aka Shinobi Girl) meditates on her Manhattan rooftop, a threatening figure lurks in the shadows!

2.title: Don't Call Me Shinobi Girl
2.plot: Shinobi Girl experiences a traumatic flashback to her deadly encounter with CEO Ronald Brooks. Christina, the former victim and #1 fan girl, sets up a website where victims can summon Shinobi Girl for help. Meanwhile, Detective D'Amato and Ms. Brooks separately concoct similar plans to trap Shinobi Girl that involve using Christina as bait.

3.title: Do Me a Favor & Die
3.plot: A battle ensues in Christina's apartment and Raven uses Christina to set a cunning trap for Shinobi Girl in an abandoned warehouse. Shinobi Girl duels with Raven and tries to plea bargain with Detective D'Amato. She escapes two attackers but is abducted by thugs!

4.title: We Could Have Been Friends
4.plot: Noriko escapes her abductors and finds herself at boot camp where A.J. becomes her instructor from hell! Noriko finally targets the evidence she needs to prove her innocence while opposing forces plot against her. To make matters worse, Noriko receives a traumatic visit from a dark figure that haunted her childhood.

5.title: A Time to Feast
5.plot: Feeling refreshed and empowered, Noriko completes her grueling ninja training with A.J. and returns to the City. Meanwhile, Ms. Brooks entertains her corporate cronies at party that includes the torture of some Occupy Wall Street protesters. Brooks personally punishes Raven for her failure to capture Shinobi Girl. In a new disguise, Noriko goes after a wanted international war criminal.

6.title: Quoth the Raven
6.plot: After Shinobi Girl brings a fugitive dictator and his cohorts to justice, Detective D'Amato becomes suspicious of Ms. Brooks' refusal to cooperate in the murder investigation of her husband. When Raven learns the true identity of Shinobi Girl, she resigns from the corporation and faces an obstacle course of corporate hit men. Finally, Raven meets A.J. at Noriko's hide-out. They fight on a rooftop but they are not alone. Noriko arrives too late and faces a tragic situation.

7.title: Lollipop for a Dead Man
7.plot: Raven joins forces with Shinobi Girl and together they pay a visit to the sniper who killed A.J. After Noriko gives A.J. a proper burial, she plots with Raven to take down Brooks and her corporate empire. Their mission is sidetracked when a psychotic ninja copycat goes on a random killing spree to slaughter innocent citizens; it's a twisted plot by Brooks to turn the tide of public opinion against the real Shinobi Girl. Detective D'Amato and reporter Rachel Rafterson are baffled at the turn of events and a city-wide manhunt for Shinobi Girl is instigated. Meanwhile, ...

8.title: Free the People
8.plot: Shinobi Girl duels with Fake Shinobi Girl and pleads with reporter Rachel Rafterson to go live on the air with an exclusive interview. Shinobi Girl pleads her case directly to the public and is arrested during the broadcast! Noriko makes a deal with Detective D'Amato and is temporarily freed. Meanwhile, Tiffany Brooks quells a corporate uprising with brute firepower as Shinobi Girl and her team of Raven and Christina plot to raid Brooks' office. Raven provides reporter Rachel Rafterson with the key evidence that may or may not clear Noriko and potentially destroy ...

imdb.plot outline: As the ultra-rich and powerful claim more and more victims, Noriko fights to save one person at a time and find evidence that will prove her innocence. But Ms. Brooks, the high society trophy-wife turned widow, is hot on her trail. Her army of elite corporate assassins includes the lethal one-woman hit squad, Raven, who has her own personal agenda and score to settle! Can Noriko challenge one of the most powerful and dangerous corporations in the world and survive long enough to prove her innocence and regain her freedom? While Noriko's life precariously balances on the edge of a blade, she vows to keep up the fight for justice!
imdb.title: Shinobi Girl
plot: As the ultra-rich and powerful claim more and more victims, Noriko fights to save one person at a time and find evidence that will prove her innocence. But Ms. Brooks, the high society trophy-wife turned widow, is hot on her trail. Her army of elite corporate assassins includes the lethal one-woman hit squad, Raven, who has her own personal agenda and score to settle! Can Noriko challenge one of the most powerful and dangerous corporations in the world and survive long enough to prove her innocence and regain her freedom? While Noriko's life precariously balances on the edge of a blade, she vows to keep up the fight for justice!::Carl Morano
